item.description:
The Unity on the River Church in Amesbury is organizing this wonderful event.
Attendees have the opportunity to hang out with Neale Donald Walsch IN PERSON!

THIS EVENT IS FREE OF CHARGE
(Love Offerings are Optional)

RSVP here, so we'll know who's coming from our Meetup.

Thank you, Nancy, for letting us know of this special event.

Nancy Taylor
http://lawofattractio...

**********************************
In the 13 years since publication of the groundbreaking spiritual text Conversations with God, people have repeatedly asked its author, NEALE DONALD WALSCH, to explain the process by which he entered into his dialogue with Deity.

Now, in a very special mind-expanding, spirit-awakening presentation, "Connecting with the Divine", Neale Donald Walsch not only explains, but for the first time demonstrates, how God communicates with all of us…

…then creates an opportunity for everyone in the room to have the same experience.


Also. 1-day Workshop with Neale Donald Walsch: When Everything Changes, Change Everything
Saturday, July 25th, 2009, 9am to 9pm

More details of BOTH events:
http://www.unityonthe...

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: An evening with NEALE DONALD WALSCH: Connecting with the Divine
